TextBody:
Hi Josh,

Thank you for reaching out.

If your EPP appliance is hosted in our AWS, we can do some backend validation and cleanup, but we would need your written approval as a reply to this message.

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer

long as we can maintain all log backups created in 2025 as well as any
shadow files that are associated with active endpoints.

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440379 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NRnkA:ref - High Disk usage on System volume [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NRnkA:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Josh,

We have completed the cleanup for the system partition, ensuring that no logs or shadows were deleted in the process. Please note that the EPP UI may take 15-20 minutes to update and reflect the actual disk space.

Once you've had a chance to verify the changes, please let us know if you need any further assistance or if we should proceed with closing the ticket.

Thank you!
Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #440379 - - High Disk usage on System volume [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NRnkA:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Josh,

Thank you for the update.

It's normal for the system partition to be occupied 40-60% of the time. However, in rare cases, the system logs rotation malfunction or other factors that can cause storage issues, triggering an alert in the UI. In such cases, you can always contact us, and we'll address it promptly.

Certain server disks can be increased, although this will incur additional costs. However, for the system partition specifically, you'll need to request a new server and migrate the data from the current one. Generally, it's not worthwhile to do so for the system partition, as space issues are very rare.
Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com
